com.stremebase.map

Class LongMap

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class LongMap
extends com.stremebase.base.FixedMap

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LongMap(String mapName)
      Creates a new LongMap that acts a simple key-value store where one long value can be associated with a given key.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LongMap

        public LongMap(String mapName)
        Creates a new LongMap that acts a simple key-value store where one long value can be associated with a given key. No need to use methods that operate with value indices or arrays. The returned LongMap is not indexed. The returned LongMap is persistent iff the database is.
        Parameters:
        mapName - name for the map. Must be a database-wide unique value.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public long get(long key)
        Returns the value at index 0
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        the value. If there's no value, returns DB.NULL.

      • get

        public void get(long key,
                long[] array)
        Returns values associated with a key to given array
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        array - the array to put the values into. If there's no value, throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
        See Also:
        FixedMap.containsKey(long key)

      • put

        public void put(long key,
                long value)
        Associates a value with a key (overwrites existing first value). Same as calling put(key, 0, value);
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - the value

      • remove

        public void remove(long key)
        Removes the given key from the map
        Specified by:
        remove in class com.stremebase.base.FixedMap
        Parameters:
        key - the key to be removed

      • indexOf

        public int indexOf(long key,
                   int fromIndex,
                   long value)
        Returns the first index of given value, starting from given position
        Specified by:
        indexOf in class com.stremebase.base.FixedMap
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        value - a value to be searched for
        fromIndex - position to start looking
        Returns:
        index for the value if found, and -1 if not found.

      • get

        public long get(long key,
                int index)
        Returns value at given index
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        index - the position
        Returns:
        the value, or DB.NULL if key was nonexistent or index was out of bounds.

      • put

        public void put(long key,
                long[] array)
        Puts multiple values at once.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        array - the values Same as calling put(key, 0, array);

      • put

        public void put(long key,
                int index,
                long[] array)
        Puts multiple values at once, starting from given position.
        Parameters:

        index - the position
        array - the values

      • values

        public LongStream values(long key)
        Returns the array associated with a key as a LongStream
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
